Table of Contents

Name

im_init - make an IMAGE descriptor

Synopsis

#include <vips/vips.h>

IMAGE *im_init( char *filename )

Description

im_init(3) allocates space for an IMAGE descriptor, sets all fields to initial values, and returns the descriptor. A copy is made of the filename argument. The IMAGE returned by im_init(3) should be passed to im_close(3) to free it.

This function is used internally by VIPS and should not be called by users.

See Also

im_mmapin(3) , im_openin(3) , im_setbuf(3) , im_close(3) .
